value.text: Book of Truth – Chapter 2
Create Wealth – Path to the 1% and Better
Create Wealth – Introduction

Do you want to be rich, very rich?
Then join “Path to the 1% and Better”.

In this video you will be presented with an opportunity to join any of the two high-tech startups as a founder’s group business partner. International candidates are also welcome. For these two businesses we do **not** need your money. We need your **talent, drive, dedication, creativity, grit, critical thinking, and good habits**.

Angel investors and entrepreneurs with good startup ideas can contact [Munzer@EmmaFoundation.net](mailto:Munzer@EmmaFoundation.net).

To understand what caliber we are looking for, try this question:

**Who has a higher probability of being robbed?**
- (a) You
- (b) Your neighbor

You only get credit if you give the **correct reason**, not only the correct answer.
What Is 'Path to the 1% and Better'?

Path To The 1% and Better (“The 1%”) is sponsored by EMMA Foundation, a US-based non-profit 501(c)3 organization.

Visit: [www.EmmaFoundation.net](https://www.EmmaFoundation.net)

[Like, subscribe, and share the video. Donations to the EMMA Foundation are appreciated and fully transparent online.](https://www.EmmaFoundation.net)
Munzer’s 8 Pistons of the Game of Life

Life is more than money. “The 1%” refers not only to wealth but to excellence in **all major dimensions of life**, called the 8 Pistons:

1. Health
2. Wealth
3. Intellect
4. Family
5. Travel
6. Purpose & Wisdom
7. Self-Mastery
8. Charity

Each piston varies in priority depending on age and personal situation.

This chapter focuses on **Piston #2 – Wealth**.
An Opportunity to Strengthen Your Wealth Piston

In this episode, you will be offered a chance to join one of two EMMA-recommended startups.

Why wealth first?
- Because most people are not there yet.
- Because wealth enables freedom to pursue the other 7 pistons.
About EMMA Foundation

EMMA members help each other grow in all 8 pistons.
EMMA has 7 tiers of members: 1%, 2%, 5%, 10%, 20%, 30%, and 32%.

Each group mentors the tier below it.

EMMA helps members set realistic goals, create plans, and take action to reach the top % of their chosen pistons.
Understanding Wealth and Net Worth

Do you know the net worth needed to be in the top 1% of your age group in the US? Most people don't.

And yet they want to become wealthy.

Being in the top 1% of the **world** is easier than being in the top 1% of the **USA**.

EMMA aims to guide you there.
EMMA Foundation’s Role – A Bottom-Up Effort

Governments won’t help you. Corporations won’t help you. So we help ourselves.

Change begins with **you**, then your family, then your neighbors.

EMMA teaches self-reliance, critical thinking, personal responsibility, and wealth creation.
Angel Investors & Entrepreneurs

“The 1%” brings angel investors and entrepreneurs together.

If you have a startup idea or want to invest in early-stage businesses, contact us at [Munzer@EmmaFoundation.net](mailto:Munzer@EmmaFoundation.net).

Local chapters worldwide are also being formed.
Blue Ocean Strategy

One of the best ways to build massive wealth is by joining a startup with **little or no competition**.

This is called the **Blue Ocean Strategy**.

Recommended books:
- *Zero to One* – Peter Thiel
- *Blue Ocean Strategy* – W. Chan Kim

EMMA's recommended startups follow this strategy.
Skills That Make You Qualified

You may qualify if you have skills in:
- Programming / coding
- Web development & SEO
- YouTube editing
- AI algorithm development
- Science, math, health, finance, real estate
- Quantitative analysis
- Philosophy & critical thinking
- Charity & volunteer work
- Digital marketing & online stores
Business, Charity & Career Opportunities

Opportunities include:
- Private Equity Exchange
- High-Frequency Trading (HFT)
- Investment clubs
- Starting your own idea (we will find investors for you)
- Sweat equity valued at millions over time
OBREC – A Massive Opportunity

OBREC focuses on online end-to-end processing of real estate and construction.

The US construction market is **$1.29 trillion** (2019).

Join OBREC to grow rich by innovating in a slow-moving industry.
ABCQ – Stock Market & AI Trading

ABCQ is a startup using advanced mathematical models similar to Jim Simons' trading algorithms.

Reference: *The Man Who Solved the Market* – Gregory Zuckerman.

ABCQ aims to operate offshore for zero corporate tax advantages.
Working Online – The Future

Triggered by COVID-19, the future belongs to remote work.

Most industries will move online, and your competitive advantage will be the ability to adapt early.
Who Can Join?

Professionals, students, professors, retirees, and international candidates.

Applicants must pass:
- IQ test
- Business knowledge test
- Psychological evaluation
- Drive test (How badly do you want to be in the 1%?)
Price’s Law

Price’s law: **Half of the output comes from the square root of the population.**

Of 330,000,000 Americans, only about 18,165 produce half of the nation’s results.

Where would you like to be?
Terms for Joining OBREC or ABCQ

These are garage startups funded by angel investors.

You may keep your day job.

Required:
- 25+ hours per week
- No salary initially
- Earn sweat equity valued in millions

Detailed agreements will follow (NDA, background check, etc).
Volunteering for EMMA Foundation

EMMA is about **personal transformation**, **critical thinking**, **service**, and **self-actualization**.

Volunteers help in:
- Tech & software
- Philosophy discussions
- Neuroscience & psychology
- Writing, editing
- AI Truth Machine
- YouTube podcasts
- Local chapters worldwide
